text: Andrew Mark Berman (born February 24, 1968) is an American actor, director, producer, writer and comedian. He is best known for his role as Dib Membrane in Invader Zim (2001-2006), Dennis in The Jamie Foxx Show (1996-1997), Chuck in The Wonder Years (1991-1993) and Guy in Psych (2006-2014). ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American television producers Category:Writers from Chicago Category:Comedians from Chicago
title: Andy Berman
